about_the_game:
Find a place on the grid for all your fluffy, goggle-eyed friends in Eyes That Hypnotise, a casual puzzle game with staring animals and a relaxing atmosphere.

Key Features:

  • Over 50 unique handcrafted levels: Each puzzle is carefully designed to tickle your brain. 12 of them available in demo.

  • 5 unique chapters: Explore different environments — home, city, farm, forest, and exotic — each with its own set of animals and charming settings. 1 of them available in demo.

  • More than 20 funny, big-eyed animals: Collect a variety of quirky creatures with their own personalities. 6 of them available in demo.

  • Interactive and expressive eyes: Watch as animals’ eyes follow your cursor, letting you create hilarious, goofy expressions. And when you solve a puzzle, their eyes light up and sparkle with pure joy!

  • Virtual sticker book for your creature collection: Keep track of all the adorable animals you gather along the way. Will be released in full version.

  • Multiple solutions for every puzzle: Flex your creativity and find different ways to solve each challenge.

  • Flexible hint system: Need help? Our hint system gently guides you without spoiling the fun.

  • Intuitive and accessible controls: Easy to pick up and play, perfect for all ages.

  • Charming hand-drawn illustrations and animations: Enjoy beautiful art that brings your furry friends to life.

  • Atmospheric music and cute sound design: Relax and immerse yourself in the game's soothing audio experience.

  • Charming interface that feels like a craft notebook: A user-friendly interface that adds to the cozy vibe.

  • Funny and playful: Tackle puzzles, play with animals’ eyes, collect all the creatures, enjoy the music, and just have fun!

Find a place on the grid for all your fluffy, goggle-eyed friends in Eyes That Hypnotise, a casual puzzle game with staring animals and a relaxing atmosphere.

Key Features:

  • Over 50 unique handcrafted levels: Each puzzle is carefully designed to tickle your brain. 12 of them available in demo.

  • 5 unique chapters: Explore different environments — home, city, farm, forest, and exotic — each with its own set of animals and charming settings. 1 of them available in demo.

  • More than 20 funny, big-eyed animals: Collect a variety of quirky creatures with their own personalities. 6 of them available in demo.

  • Interactive and expressive eyes: Watch as animals’ eyes follow your cursor, letting you create hilarious, goofy expressions. And when you solve a puzzle, their eyes light up and sparkle with pure joy!

  • Virtual sticker book for your creature collection: Keep track of all the adorable animals you gather along the way. Will be released in full version.

  • Multiple solutions for every puzzle: Flex your creativity and find different ways to solve each challenge.

  • Flexible hint system: Need help? Our hint system gently guides you without spoiling the fun.

  • Intuitive and accessible controls: Easy to pick up and play, perfect for all ages.

  • Atmospheric music and cute sound design: Relax and immerse yourself in the game's soothing audio experience.

  • Funny and playful: Tackle puzzles, play with animals’ eyes, collect all the creatures, enjoy the music, and just have fun!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz or faster processor (Apple Silicon & Intel supported)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal or OpenGL 3
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15+
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz or faster processor (Apple Silicon & Intel supported)
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal or OpenGL 3
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Eyes That Hypnotise Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (or Higher)
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Videocard with at least 512MB
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (or Higher)
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Eyes that Hypnotise is a cozy, hand-drawn puzzle where you arrange fluffy friends to fit the grid. With their funny big eyes and a calming mood, this game offers a relaxing escape. Enjoy handcrafted levels, collect creatures of all shapes and sizes, and immerse yourself in this engaging puzzle game.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
